## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been hearing a lot about the Verus testnet lately. What's special about the v0.7.2 testnet of Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
The v0.7.2 testnet of Verus is considered the most groundbreaking testnet released by the Verus project, featuring many new capabilities and blockchain firsts. These new capabilities will eventually be available on the mainnet once they are fully hardened, tested, and ready for worldwide, public scale. It's a significant milestone for the Verus project.

**User:**
That sounds impressive. What is the current status of the Verus testnet?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus testnet is a fully decentralized blockchain network, operating with 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake, and is available worldwide. It is currently running all of the new Verus protocols being tested and hardened for mainnet. It's a live, functioning network that's open for anyone to use.

**User:**
Before I start using the testnet, what should I keep in mind when using the Verus testnet currencies and assets?

**AI Assistant:**
That's a great question! All currencies and assets on the Verus testnet have no value and may be reset at any time for testing purposes. This means that any assets you acquire on the testnet should not be considered valuable or permanent. Don't get too attached to them!

**User:**
How can I get a representative basket of Verus testnet currencies to try out the new protocols?

**AI Assistant:**
Easy! You can visit the Verus Discord and ask in the #pbaas-development channel to receive a representative basket of Verus testnet currencies. This will allow you to try out the new protocols from anywhere in the world. Just head over to Discord and ask away!

**User:**
I've heard that DeFi and cross-currency liquidity are integrated with blockchain processing, fees, VerusID, and Verus PoP on the Verus testnet. What's the significance of this integration?

**AI Assistant:**
This integration is a massive set of platform capabilities that takes DeFi further than any project in crypto today. It represents a significant advancement in the field of decentralized finance, and its implications are multifaceted and far-reaching. It's a game-changer for the crypto space, and we're excited to see how it will be used.

What is special about the v0.7.2 testnet of Verus?

The v0.7.2 testnet of Verus is considered the most groundbreaking testnet released by the Verus project, featuring many new capabilities and blockchain firsts. These new capabilities will eventually be available on the mainnet once they are fully hardened, tested, and ready for worldwide, public scale.

This is the most groundbreaking testnet the Verus project has ever released, and we believe it holds the potential to improve and reshape the DeFi industry. There are truly so many new capabilities and blockchain firsts working now on testnet that it’s hard to adequately cover them all. Below is a list of new capabilities active on the v0.7.2 testnet that will be on mainnet in the near future when considered fully hardened, tested, and ready for worldwide, public scale. Until then, Verus testnet is a fully decentralized blockchain network with 50% proof of work, 50% proof of stake, worldwide availability, and is running all of the new Verus protocols that are being tested and hardened for mainnet. All currencies and assets on the Verus testnet have absolutely no value and may be reset at any time in the interest of testing for mainnet. If you would like a representative basket of Verus testnet currencies that you can use to try out all of the new protocols from anywhere in the world, simply visit the Verus Discord and ask in the #pbaas-development channel.
